text: Mohammad Bolboli Romi (, born 11 January 1998) is an Iranian footballer who plays as a left winger who currently plays for Iranian club Esteghlal in the Persian Gulf Pro League. ==Club career== ===Sepidrood=== He made his debut for Sepidrood in 17th fixtures of 2018–19 Iran Pro League against Sepahan S.C. while he substituted in for Mohammad Gholami. ==References== Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian footballers Category:Sepahan players Category:Esteghlal F.C. players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Mohammad Bolboli
